attributes.action: Make st George's day a national public holiday in England
attributes.additional_details: It is neither racist, jingoistic, colonialist or imperialist to have a national public holiday for st George's day and the same applies to Wales on st David's day
attributes.background: Other countries (Scotland)  in the uk have a more recognised patrons day than England and have a public national holiday for st Andrews day. England is long overdue a national public holiday for st George's day.
